short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights all the headings on a page to visually allow the user to see the heading hierarchy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that highlights all the headings (h1-h6) on the page. I made this to extension to help me quickly get a rough idea of the heading structure when carrying out accessibility audits. Each heading is given an outline with a specific colour. A key is also appended to the body which illustrates the mapping of colour to heading.
